abstract: Manager Joe Girardi on Tuesday discussed the Yankees' inability to get past the first round of the playoffs this year and what next year might hold.
snippet: Manager Joe Girardi on Tuesday discussed the Yankees' inability to get past the first round of the playoffs this year and what next year might hold.
lead_paragraph: Five days after the abrupt ending to the Yankees' season, Manager Joe Girardi addressed reporters at Yankee Stadium on Tuesday and discussed the team's inability to get past the first round of the playoffs and what next year might hold.

headline.main: Next Year's Rotation Is on Girardi's Mind
